protocol.name: P-TABM-103
protocol.text: RNA was extracted from the bulked plants using TRIzol as per the manufacturer’s protocol (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA), followed by purification on RNeasy columns (Qiagen, Valencia, CA, USA).

protocol.name: P-TABM-1196
protocol.text: Quantile normalization was performed via the "quantile" option for normalization in the "expresso" function of Bioconductor.

protocol.name: P-TABM-hans12
protocol.text: The labeled cRNA was hybridized to Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChips according to the manufacturer’s guidelines in the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual 701021 rev5 (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA, USA).  Wash protocol EukGE-WS2 v4_450 was used.

protocol.name: P-TABM-hans18
text: Seeds of  Arabidopsis thaliana accessions Bay-0; Sha; and Bay-0 x Sha RILs originally developed by O. Loudet (
); were obtained from ABRC through TAIR (www.arabidopsis.org).   Due to limitations in growth chamber space;  two biologi

protocol.name: P-TABM-hans19
protocol.text: cDNA and labeled cRNA were prepared according to the manufacturer’s guidelines in the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual 701021 rev5 (Affymetrix; Santa Clara; CA; USA). The cDNA synthesis was initiated with 5 micrograms total RNA; one-cycle cDNA synthesis and cRNA labeling were performed with kits purchased from Affymetrix.
